entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 8:44 PM MST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:44 PM MST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains early in the evening. Wind becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 8:44 PM MST Sunday 7 May 2023
